metadata.title: CVE-2021-30501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An assertion abort was found in upx MemBuffer::alloc() in mem.cpp, inversion UPX 4.0.0. The flow allows attackers to cause a denial of service(abort) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
